data.title: The Archaeological Research Institute
data.meta_description: Home Join the Archaeological Research Institute and learn about archaeology and the region's cultural heritage through hands-on experiences!
data.meta_site_name: The Archaeological Research Institute | Exploring the Past To Preserve the Future
data.text:
When youâ€™re at ARI, our team of dedicated archaeologists will lead you on an immersive and engaging journey to discover the people who walked here decades and even centuries before us. Dig into the captivating history of our region in a variety of ways: excavating in the ground, handling and analyzing artifacts in the lab, investigating ancient technologies, touring local cultural sites, and so much more! Together, we will weave the story of our local history, engage in research and collaboration, and contribute to the mission of preserving archaeological sites in the region.

The history belongs to all of us, and it is our job at ARI to put that history into your hands. Join us and discover the wonders of the past, which are at your fingertips.

Our organization, a registered 501(c)(3) nonprofit, depends on the generosity of donors to fulfill our mission and accomplish our goals. By joining our cause, you can contribute to the preservation of regional archaeological sites and the invaluable cultural heritage they hold, ensuring their existence for generations to come. Take action now by making a donation and have a tangible impact on the preservation of our shared history.
